name: Late Night Drifters Online
description:
Made for the 32bit Jam 2022

 

Race against the time, drift and boost in this PSX styled racing game with drop-in/drop-out multiplayer inspired to games like Trackmania!

Late Night Drifters (LND) is an online racing game where every player races in the same track at the same time with just one goal: get the best time.

Drift to charge up your boost bar, then unleash the true power!

Tracks are fast (less then 30 seconds per track) and you can start over in every moment. Will you be the fastest?

CONTROLS
Up / D-pad X/A: Throttle
Down / D-pad Square/A: Brake
Left/Right/D-pad Left/D-pad right: turn
Spacebar/D-pad Circle/R/R2: Handbrake. Press again during drift at max charge to boost
